summary_markdown: This table outlines ESPN's consumer product offerings across various media platforms, demonstrating a multi-channel distribution strategy. The core product, "ESPN The Magazine," is presented with its Spanish language versions, "ESPN La Revisita" and "Revisita ESPN," alongside related print products like "ESPN Books." The "Online" column details a comprehensive digital presence, including the main ESPN website, specialized sports sites (e.g., ESPNDeportes.com, ESPNCricinfo.com), radio platforms (ESPNRadio.com, ESPN Deportes Radio), and mobile services. The "Television" column lists numerous ESPN-branded television channels, indicating a significant broadcast component. Finally, "Interactive" media includes physical locations such as "ESPN Zone" and "ESPN Wide World Sports Complex," suggesting experiential offerings. The structure highlights how a central brand extends into diverse content formats and engagement channels.
